q: `` You'd think Cher Lloyd would just be happy for the chance, but she's told Simon Cowell she wants to do it her own way,'' one source blabs to the Daily Mail. She's thrown a few heavy-duty tantrums and is, frankly, being a bit of a pain, adds the insider.`` You have to admire such self-confidence in a young girl, but she's no respecter of authority and she's had run-ins with a few people.'' Satya Nadella will be promoted to the position from his current role as senior vice president, where he most recently worked with the company's Online Services Division. If AIG, whose reckless behavior resulted in a$ 182 billion taxpayer bailout, prefers to do business in Republican states, then the next time they go bankrupt, I hope they don't ask taxpayers in Vermont and other Democratic-leaning states for another bailout, Senator Sen. Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters. went back and forth in our heads, we never went back and forth in our hearts.'' Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
